body_html:
@ezyang
Finally, I have a workaround for the clang asan build.
Now, the failed becomes "pytorch_linux_xenial_py3_clang5_asan_test" timeout.
The timeout setting is 1 hr. I checked another passed case[1]. It cost 53min, and it's close to 1hr.
How to re-trigger that test case?

[1]
https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/219150?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link

body:
@ezyang 
Finally, I have a workaround for the clang asan build.
Now, the failed becomes "pytorch_linux_xenial_py3_clang5_asan_test" timeout.
The timeout setting is 1 hr. I checked another passed case[1]. It cost 53min, and it's close to 1hr.
How to re-trigger that test case?

[1]
https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/219150?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link
